thread.title: Paolo Ferragina
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Paolo Ferragina

author: Paolo Ferragina
title: Paolo Ferragina
text:
I got a barbour. Everithing was fine!Great comunication,fast shipping,very competitive price.huge choise of products and brands
I only suggest to improve the product measurement (showing cm of the chest,back,waist etc)! it could be easier to buy for the customer!
